definitions: a small, chiefly freshwater, American fish resembling the carp, having internal fertilization and giving birth to live young. Many livebearers, including the guppy, swordtail, mollies, platyfish, and gambusias, are very popular in aquariums.

notes.text: Family Poeciliidae: many genera and species

shortDefinitions: small, chiefly freshwater American toothcarp that has internal fertilization
